Deputy Health and Disability Commissioner says Te Whatu Ora Waikato did not share patient info of person who later diagnosed with cancer https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/deputy-health-and-disability-commissioner-says-te-whatu-ora-waikato-did-not-share-patent-info-led-to-early-死亡/JTY35DIKONBB3B73QCQHD7WAUI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/deputy-health-and-disability-commissioner-says-te-whatu-ora-waikato-did-not-share-patent-info-led-to-early-死亡/JTY35DIKONBB3B73QCQHD7WAUI/ Raphael FranksAn X-ray found nodules in lungs, but woman and GP were not told. She died months later. Mon, 20 May 2024 03:20:19 +0000 Te Whatu Ora Waikato failed to pass on critical information about a patient’s X-ray results, resulting in a late cancer diagnosis, the Deputy Disability Commissioner has found.
